name: EVO ISLAND
description:
Play the first 7 matches for FREE! In-app purchase is required to unlock unlimited games. Thank you for taking the time to download and try our game.

After eons of adaptation, you find yourself on the shores of a new world. A new beginning...

To achieve victory you must balance population growth, resistances, intelligence, and warrior upgrades to fully populate every territory in the region with your intelligent species. But beware, you aren't alone and must protect yourself from predators who will stop at nothing to bring you to extinction.

Do you have what it takes to survive, grow, and achieve self awareness?
